titles.title: You Opened The Gate To A Brand New Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You opened the gate to a brand new life
When I came to the altar.
You opened the door and Your Spirit
Filled me through and through.
But now my heart still longs for something deeper,
And I can see light,
Through a veil that You have torn in two.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I want to break through, I want to break through,
To know as I'm known,
To know You alone; I want to break through.
To where no sin can stand in the way,
Let me enter in with boldness I pray:
Oh show me Thy glory, show me thy way,
I want to break through.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When I was a child, I thought as a child,
And childish things I longed for.
But when I grew up, childish things I laid aside.
And now, you're calling me to something deeper.
Though now dimly I see, you're coming in me,
And I shall break through.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I'm going to break through.
I'm going to break through.
I'll know as I'm known; I'll know you alone.
I'm going to break through.
Now there's no sin that can stand in the way.
I will enter in; you've opened the way.
I'll see your glory, I'll see your face.
I'm going to break through.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Abriste la puerta a neuva vida cuando vine a tu altar,
Y tu Santo Espiritu me ha llenado más y más.
Mas hoy, anhelo algo más profundo,
A través del velo roto puedo ver Tu luz.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Yo quiero vencer, yo quiero vencer.
Para conocerte sólo a Ti, yo quiero vencer.
No quiero que haya pecado en mí;
Deseo entrar confiado en Ti.
Muestra Tu gloria, es mí oracíon.
Yo quiero vencer.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
La puerta abriste a una vida nueva
Cuando vine a tu altar
La puerta abriste y tu Espíritu Santo me llenó
Pero algo más profundo desea mi alma
Puedo ver luz a través del velo que ha roto en dos.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Yo quiero entrar, yo quiero entrar
Para verte a ti, como me ves a mí
Yo quiero entrar,
Donde confiado yo pueda estar
Que no haya pecado que me impida
Donde vea tu gloria, tu gracia alcanzar
Yo quiero entrar.
